name: The O Group
description:
The O Group is an independently owned branding and creative agency headquartered in New York City. Our focus from the beginning has been to reimagine how luxury brands are shaped. Many people can identify where luxury came from. Our mission is to help shape where it’s headed. We do that by becoming true partners to our clients and helping them define a unique brand voice inside the ever-changing and growing marketplace.
Our highly strategic and creative teams work collaboratively with every client. We have developed a proven, results-oriented process that insures success and delivers work that inspires.
